entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
